name: Baldur's Gate II: Shadows of Amn
description:
Every world has conflict. In Baldur's gate II: Shadows of Amn, you'll find yourself playing between these two factions. This epic sequel to the role playing game of the year will immerse you in a world where your ability to discern the difference between these sides determines your fate.

* Create a new character or import your Baldur's Gate or Tales of the Sword Coast character into Baldur's Gate II and continue the saga.
* Encounter hundreds of different types of monsters, thousands of NPC's and over 130 new spells in a huge and intricate world.
* Richer quests & subquests, including quests based on class, add more realism than ever before seen in an RPG.
